List Newest to Oldest List Oldest to Newest List Price High to Low List Price Low to High Recently Posted Cars: 2007 - Lexus RX 400 Salt Lake City, UT This 2007 Lexus RX400H Hybrid is a perfect example of an extra clean , LOW MILEAGE , very well maintained , 1 owner. It is as nice of an example of a RX400H that you will find anywhere for any price. ... $3,900 00 Jul 12, 2012 1 Min 2004 - Honda Civic Hybrid Malad, ID I am selling this 2004 hybrid. It has been an awesome car but time for a bigger family vehicle. car drives great and gets 40-44mpg. New tires on the front wheels. Let me know if interested.... $6,700 00 Jul 12, 2012 1 Min 1983 - Volkswagen Rabbit SLC, UT A rare treasure, a 1983 VW diesel truck in excellent condition. Everything works including the hard to find A/C. In a confusing world of advanced technology cars that hybrids get 30 MPG here is a 29... $4,000 00 Jul 12, 2012 2 Min 1989 - Jaguar Vanden Plas Provo, UT I have a 1989 Jaguar Vanden Plas with 120,000 original miles , strong motor, power windows, locks, sunroof, all original, good tires, clean utah title on hand,, if interested please call or text Mirna... $1,300 00 Jul 12, 2012 2 Min 1997 - Ford Ranger Provo, UT one owner any thing that has gone wrong with was fixed immedeatly. new clutch new break pads new master cylender new fule pump.... $1,500 00 Jul 12, 2012 3 Min 1994 - AC Cars Other (AC Cars) Provo, UT water jet ski for sale asking 1,600 obo has no problems and is well montained. the reason why im selling it is because i need money right now or i would keep it if intreasted please give me a call tha... $1,600 00 Jul 12, 2012 7 Min 1997 - Acura Integra Salt Lake, UT 97 Acura Integra LS. Automatic, A/C, Cruise Control, Sunroof. It runs and A/C works. It's a Honda motor it might run forever. Text is the best and quickest way to get ahold of me, but you can cal... $1,350 00 Jul 12, 2012 7 Min 1999 - Dodge Ram 2500 Santaquin, UT 1999 Dodge long bed. Has a crack in the engine block that needs to be fixed. Call for more information. No trades. Thanks.... $4,000 00 Jul 12, 2012 7 Min 2004 - Ford Explorer Salt Lake City, UT Ford Explorer XLS 2 wheel drive... $2,900 00 Jul 12, 2012 7 Min 1987 - Mazda RX-7 American Fork, UT This car is in really good condition... I got the car a couple months ago and was hoping to sport it out but I have been too busy and we need a car that can seat the our family. The last time I tried ... $1,350 00 Jul 12, 2012 7 Min 1998 - Dodge Stratus Murray, UT 1998 Dodge Stratus ES-**Excellent condition inside and out**Very reliable, runs and drives perfect..AC BLOWS ICE COLD!!..No mechanical issues..Only has 139,000 miles!!..Gets 0VER 30MPG..Tires are in g... $3,000 00 Jul 12, 2012 8 Min 2010 - Dodge Avenger Santaquin, UT This is a great car for just about anyone, 2010 Dodge Avenger, only 43k miles, black interior, silver exterior, dark tinted windows, rear spoiler, hardly used tires, awesome speakers! rides smoothly a... $15,500 00 Jul 12, 2012 9 Min 2000 - Mazda MPV Tooele, UT This Mazda MPV is a decent car, but does have some big mechanical issues right now. It would be a great pickup for someone who needs a family car and can work on it themselves. The current problems ... $700 00 Jul 12, 2012 9 Min 2009 - Toyota Highlander Lehi, UT This is a great SUV, really good in snow and in excellent condition!... $22,650 00 Jul 12, 2012 10 Min 1969 - Chevrolet Camaro taylorsville, UT 1969 CHEVROLET CAMARO SS COUPE.. Any info and pictures email me at : cruzalicia92@gmail.com THIS IS A VERY NICE DEPENDABLE, READY TO DRIVE AND ENJOY CAMARO!!! BEAUTIFUL BLACK WITH BLACK VINYL TOP AND ... $7,300 00 Jul 12, 2012 10 Min 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 Beware of Classified Ad Fraud! KSL Classifieds is meant to be a local service for those in Utah and the immediately surrounding areas. However, individuals outside of the country will frequently contact sellers or post their own fraudulent ads. Do not be misled! These are not honest people with exceptional deals, but criminals trying to take your money. Watch for the following signs:
Buyer/Seller explains that they are currently out of the country. Buyer/Seller offers to pay with a money order or cashiers check for significantly more than the asked for price. Buyer/Seller requests that the payment be wired, submitted online, or cashiers check sent, and that the item will require delivery. Buyer/Seller explains that a third party or service will pick up or deliver the item. Email inquiry is poorly written, generic, or strange sounding. Offer is simply too good to be true. Seller says that KSL will handle the transaction. KSL is NEVER involved in any transaction between buyer and seller.
For more information on how to protect yourself: CLICK HERE. About this ad About this ad Most Popular Read Video Commented Sports Deseret News
